Package model

Class ToDoListModel

java.lang.Object
model.ToDoListModel
public class ToDoListModel extends Object
Author:
Anupama Hazarika This class stores information about a list of tasks and has methods to add, remove, and update tasks. It allows the getting and setting of its various fields and has a String description which can be set by the user and then displayed to them.
